content: I'm actually interested in pea protein, so thanks for the recommendations! I've tried oat milk and it's my favorite plant-based milk so far, by the way. I've been using it in my morning oatmeal. Speaking of oatmeal, I recently discovered an amazing vegan oatmeal recipe that uses banana and peanut butter to add natural sweetness and creaminess. Anyway, back to pea protein - do you think I should go with an unflavored or flavored option?
